trans-unit.source: Provides user interface (UI) elements for logging in to a Web site.
trans-unit.target: 提供使用者介面 (UI) 項目以登入網站。

trans-unit.source: In this topic:
trans-unit.target: 本主題內容：

trans-unit.source: [Introduction](#introduction)
trans-unit.target: [簡介](#introduction)

trans-unit.source: [Style and Templates](#styles_and_templates)
trans-unit.target: [樣式和範本](#styles_and_templates)

trans-unit.source: [Validation Groupings](#validation_groupings)
trans-unit.target: [驗證群組](#validation_groupings)

trans-unit.source: [Accessibility](#accessibility)
trans-unit.target: [協助工具選項](#accessibility)

trans-unit.source: [Applying CSS Styles](#applying_styles)
trans-unit.target: [套用 CSS 樣式](#applying_styles)

trans-unit.source: [Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax)
trans-unit.target: [宣告式語法](#declarative_syntax)

trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: 簡介

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control is a composite control that provides all the common UI elements needed to authenticate a user on a Web site.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制項是複合控制項，以提供網站上的使用者進行驗證所需所有常見的 UI 元素。

trans-unit.source: The following three elements are required for all login scenarios:
trans-unit.target: 下列三個項目所需的所有登入案例：

trans-unit.source: A unique user name to identify the user.
trans-unit.target: 唯一的使用者名稱來識別使用者。

trans-unit.source: A password to verify the identity of the user.
trans-unit.target: 用來驗證使用者的身分識別密碼。

trans-unit.source: A login button to send the login information to the server.
trans-unit.target: 登入按鈕以登入資訊傳送至伺服器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control also provides the following optional UI elements that support additional functions:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制項也提供下列選擇性 UI 項目來支援其他函數：

trans-unit.source: A link for a password reminder.
trans-unit.target: 密碼提示的連結。

trans-unit.source: A Remember Me checkbox for retaining the login information between sessions.
trans-unit.target: 記住我 核取方塊保留工作階段之間的登入資訊。

trans-unit.source: A Help link for users who are having trouble logging in.
trans-unit.target: 無法登入的使用者說明連結。

trans-unit.source: A Register New User link that redirects users to a registration page.
trans-unit.target: 將使用者重新導向到註冊網頁註冊新的使用者連結。

trans-unit.source: Instruction text that appears on the login form.
trans-unit.target: 登入表單顯示的指示文字。

trans-unit.source: Custom error text that appears when the user clicks the login button without filling in the user name or password fields.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者沒有填寫使用者名稱或密碼欄位中選擇 登入按鈕時所顯示的自訂錯誤文字。

trans-unit.source: Custom error text that appears if the login fails.
trans-unit.target: 登入失敗時顯示自訂的錯誤文字。

trans-unit.source: A custom action that occurs when login succeeds.
trans-unit.target: 自訂動作的登入成功時，就會發生。

trans-unit.source: A way to hide the login control if the user is already logged in to the site.
trans-unit.target: 若要隱藏登入控制項，如果使用者已經登入至站台的一種方式。

trans-unit.source: For a table showing which controls are required and which are optional, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LayoutTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 顯示可控制所需的、 哪些是選擇性的資料表，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LayoutTemplate%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you are not familiar with the set of login controls available in ASP.NET, see [ASP.NET Login Controls Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac032230-6469-4b03-b68d-03ef2643a24d) before continuing.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不熟悉 ASP.NET 中可用的登入控制項組，請參閱[ASP.NET 登入控制項概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac032230-6469-4b03-b68d-03ef2643a24d)才能繼續。

trans-unit.source: For a list of other topics related to login controls and membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd).
trans-unit.target: 如需登入控制項及成員資格相關的其他主題的清單，請參閱[使用成員資格管理使用者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd)。

trans-unit.source: Accepting user input is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 接受使用者輸入可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: Malicious users can send data that is intended to expose vulnerabilities or run programs that try generated passwords.
trans-unit.target: 惡意使用者可以傳送資料，目的是要公開的弱點可能會或執行程式，嘗試產生的密碼。

trans-unit.source: To improve security when working with user input, you should use the validation features of your control and secure any data providers that are configured for your control.
trans-unit.target: 為了提高安全性，處理使用者輸入時，您應該使用您的控制項的驗證功能，並保護您的控制項設定的任何資料提供者。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Login Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c), [Basic Security Practices for Web Applications](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3eeeee9e-b09f-4c7f-8ce5-d9ca1f9322ad), and [Securing Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2dab2012-c278-426a-bb0d-93b260c428a7).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[保護登入控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)，[的 Web 應用程式的基本安全性作法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3eeeee9e-b09f-4c7f-8ce5-d9ca1f9322ad)，和[保護的成員資格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2dab2012-c278-426a-bb0d-93b260c428a7)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control uses a membership provider to obtain user credentials.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制項使用成員資格提供者以取得使用者認證。

trans-unit.source: Unless you specify otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control uses the default membership provider defined in the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 除非另外指定，否則<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制項使用 Web.config 檔案中定義的預設成員資格提供者。

trans-unit.source: To specify a different provider, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.MembershipProvider%2A> property to one of the membership provider names defined in your application's Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定不同的提供者，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.MembershipProvider%2A>應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中定義的屬性設為其中的成員資格提供者名稱。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Membership Providers](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d2c90ff6-aa86-4001-b2c5-e5c99cb7f68f).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[成員資格提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d2c90ff6-aa86-4001-b2c5-e5c99cb7f68f)。

trans-unit.source: If you want to use a custom authentication service, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.OnAuthenticate%2A> method to call the service.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要使用的自訂驗證服務，您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.OnAuthenticate%2A>方法來呼叫服務。

trans-unit.source: Styles and Templates
trans-unit.target: 樣式和範本

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control is fully customizable through templates and style settings.
trans-unit.target: 外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制項是可以完全自訂，透過範本和樣式設定。

trans-unit.source: All UI text messages are also customizable through properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> class.
trans-unit.target: 所有的 UI 文字訊息也會透過屬性的可自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>類別。

trans-unit.source: The default interface text is automatically localized based on the locale setting on the server.
trans-unit.target: 預設介面文字自動會依據伺服器上的地區設定來當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control is customized with templates, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A> property are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制項自訂範本，然後在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A>屬性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A>屬性會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: In this case, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A> property of each template child control directly.
trans-unit.target: 在此案例中，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A>屬性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A>每個範本子控制項的直接的屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control properties represented by text boxes, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.UserName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Password%2A>, are accessible during all phases of the page life cycle.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> 控制由文字方塊中，例如屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.UserName%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Password%2A>，都可以存取頁面生命週期的所有階段。

trans-unit.source: The control will pick up any changes made by the end user by means of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.TextChanged> event triggered by the textboxes.
trans-unit.target: 藉由使用者所做的任何變更會採用控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.TextChanged>文字方塊所觸發的事件。

trans-unit.source: If you embed the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep> object, explicitly set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A> property in a `Page_Load` event handler if the user is authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 如果您將內嵌<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep>物件、 明確設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A>中的屬性`Page_Load`事件處理常式，如果使用者驗證。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control does not automatically advance to the next <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep> object in this scenario.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項不會不會自動前進到下一步<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep>在此案例中的物件。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control style properties and explains which UI element each style property affects.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制樣式屬性，並說明每個樣式屬性會影響哪些 UI 項目。

trans-unit.source: For a list of which properties each style applies to, see the documentation for the individual style properties.
trans-unit.target: 如需哪些屬性的每個樣式套用至清單，請參閱個別的樣式屬性的文件。

trans-unit.source: Style property
trans-unit.target: 樣式屬性

trans-unit.source: UI element affected
trans-unit.target: 受影響的 UI 項目

trans-unit.source: The space between the control contents and the control's border.
trans-unit.target: 在控制項內容控制項的框線之間的空間。

trans-unit.source: Remember Me checkbox.
trans-unit.target: 記住我 核取方塊。

trans-unit.source: Login failure text.
trans-unit.target: 登入失敗的文字。

trans-unit.source: Instructional text on the page that tells users how to use the control.
trans-unit.target: 告訴使用者如何使用控制項的頁面上的指示文字。

trans-unit.source: Labels for all input fields, such as text boxes.
trans-unit.target: 所有輸入的欄位，例如文字方塊的標籤。

trans-unit.source: Text entry input fields.
trans-unit.target: 文字項目輸入的欄位。

trans-unit.source: Title text.
trans-unit.target: 標題文字。

trans-unit.source: Text displayed to the user when a login attempt is unsuccessful due to validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 登入嘗試因驗證錯誤而失敗時，對使用者顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: Links to other pages.
trans-unit.target: 連結至其他網頁。

trans-unit.source: Login button.
trans-unit.target: 登入 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Validation Groupings
trans-unit.target: 驗證群組

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.UserName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Password%2A> properties have <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator> controls associated with them to prevent users from submitting the page without providing required information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.UserName%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Password%2A>屬性有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator>送出頁面，但未提供必要的資訊時，防止使用者與其相關聯的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control uses a validation group so that other fields on the same page as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control can be validated separately.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制項使用的驗證群組，以便與相同的頁面上其他欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>個別驗證控制項。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control is used as the name of the validation group.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制項當做驗證群組名稱。

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control with the ID "Login1" will use a validation group name of "Login1".
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>識別碼為"Login1"的控制項將會使用"Login1"的驗證群組名稱。

trans-unit.source: If you want to set the validation group that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control is part of, you must template the control and change the validation group name.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要設定的驗證群組<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制項是的一部分，您必須將控制項樣板和變更的驗證群組名稱。

trans-unit.source: Applying CSS Styles
trans-unit.target: 套用 CSS 樣式

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control lets you specify CSS style rules in markup.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制項可讓您在標記中指定的 CSS 樣式規則。

trans-unit.source: If you use templates to customize the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control, you can specify CSS styles in the markup in the templates.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用範本自訂外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制項，您可以指定 CSS 樣式中的範本中的標記。

trans-unit.source: In that case, no extra outer table is required.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，額外外部資料表不是必要的。

trans-unit.source: You can prevent the table from being rendered by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RenderOuterTable%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 您可以防止資料表呈現的設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RenderOuterTable%2A>屬性`false`。

trans-unit.source: Accessibility
trans-unit.target: 協助工具選項

trans-unit.source: For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何設定這個控制項，使其產生符合網頁可及性標準標記資訊，請參閱[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).

trans-unit.source: Declarative Syntax
trans-unit.target: 宣告式語法

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control to provide a UI for logging in to a Web site.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>，以登入的網站提供的 UI 控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how you can extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何擴充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The `CustomLogin` control includes a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control that lets users choose which membership provider they are authenticated with.
trans-unit.target: `CustomLogin`控制項包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控制項，讓使用者選擇哪一個與驗證的成員資格提供者。

trans-unit.source: (These providers are configured in Web.config.) In the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.OnLoggingIn%2A> method, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.MembershipProvider%2A> property is set to the selected value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control.
trans-unit.target: （在 Web.config 中未設定這些提供者）。在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.OnLoggingIn%2A>方法，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.MembershipProvider%2A>屬性設定為選取值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例包含一個文字方塊，可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.%23ctor%2A> constructor to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control and add that instance to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> collection of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PlaceHolder> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.%23ctor%2A>建構函式建立的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制項並加入至該執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PlaceHolder>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a user is authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者已驗證時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Authenticate> event is raised when a user uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control to log in to a Web site.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Authenticate>使用者使用時，就會引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制項來登入網站。

trans-unit.source: Custom authentication schemes can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Authenticate> event to authenticate users.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用自訂驗證配置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Authenticate>來驗證使用者的事件。

trans-unit.source: When a user uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control to log in to a Web site, all data in the view state and all post data is lost.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制項來登入的網站，檢視狀態中的所有資料和所有的張貼資料都會遺失。

trans-unit.source: Do not perform actions in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Authenticate> event that rely on the view state.
trans-unit.target: 不會執行動作中的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Authenticate>依賴檢視狀態的事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Authenticate> event to call site-specific custom authentication code.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Authenticate>呼叫站台特有的自訂驗證程式碼的事件。

trans-unit.source: Custom authentication schemes should set the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AuthenticateEventArgs.Authenticated" /> property to <see langword="true" /> to indicate that a user has been authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 應該將自訂驗證配置<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AuthenticateEventArgs.Authenticated" />屬性<see langword="true" />表示使用者已經過驗證。

trans-unit.source: When a user submits his or her login information, the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login" /> control first raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggingIn" /> event, then the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Authenticate" /> event, and finally the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggedIn" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者提交他或她的登入資訊<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login" />控制第一個引發<see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggingIn" />事件，則<see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Authenticate" />事件，最後再<see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggedIn" />事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of padding inside the borders of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login" /> 控制項之框線內部的填補量。

trans-unit.source: The amount of space (in pixels) between the contents of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login" /> control and the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login" /> control's border.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login" /> 控制項內容與 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login" /> 控制項框線之間的間距 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="1" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="1" />。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.BorderPadding%2A> property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.BorderPadding%2A>屬性儲存在檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.BorderPadding" /> property is set to a value less than -1.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.BorderPadding" /> 屬性會設定為小於 -1 的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> object that defines the settings for the Remember Me check box.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> 物件的參考，其定義了 [儲存我的資訊] 核取方塊的設定。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> that defines the style settings for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login" /> control's Remember Me check box.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> 的參考，其定義了 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login" /> 控制項之 [儲存我的資訊] 核取方塊的樣式設定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CheckBoxStyle%2A> property gets a reference to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object that you use to change the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control's Remember Me check box.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CheckBoxStyle%2A>屬性取得的參考<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>物件，以便用來變更外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制項的記住我 核取方塊。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>它所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `CheckBoxStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>類別 (例如， `CheckBoxStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CheckBoxStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以程式設計方式設定屬性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `CheckBoxStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 一般設定包括自訂背景色彩、 文字色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CheckBoxStyle%2A> property defines the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RememberMeText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CheckBoxStyle%2A>屬性定義的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RememberMeText%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CheckBoxStyle%2A> property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control.
trans-unit.target: 樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CheckBoxStyle%2A>屬性會與樣式設定合併<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Any settings made in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CheckBoxStyle%2A> property override the corresponding settings in properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control.
trans-unit.target: 中所做的任何設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CheckBoxStyle%2A>屬性覆寫屬性中的對應設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control style properties are overridden by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CheckBoxStyle%2A> settings:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制項樣式屬性會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CheckBoxStyle%2A>設定：

trans-unit.source: When you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CheckBoxStyle%2A> property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用範本來定義外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CheckBoxStyle%2A>屬性沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the text color of the Remember Me check box to blue and the font style to italic by setting properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CheckBoxStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設定 記住我所檢查的文字色彩為藍色方塊和字型樣式為斜體設定屬性的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>所參考物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CheckBoxStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Creates the individual controls that make up the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login" /> control and associates event handlers with their events.
trans-unit.target: 建立組成 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login" /> 控制項的個別控制項，以及將事件處理常式與其事件相關聯。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateChildControls%2A> method creates instances of the controls that compose the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateChildControls%2A>方法會建立構成控制項的執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets the location of an image to display next to the link to a registration page for new users.
trans-unit.target: 取得顯示在新使用者註冊頁面的連結旁邊之影像的位置。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the image to display.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示的映像 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of a link to a registration page for new users.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定新使用者註冊頁面之連結的文字。

trans-unit.source: The text of the link to the new-user registration page.
trans-unit.target: 新使用者註冊頁面之連結的文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserText%2A> property contains the text of a link to the registration page for the site.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserText%2A>屬性包含的站台的 [註冊] 頁面的連結文字。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the registration page is specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: [註冊] 頁面的 URL 中指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserUrl%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserUrl%2A> is empty, the text in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserText%2A> property is displayed to the user, but is not formatted as a link.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserUrl%2A>為空的、 中的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserText%2A>屬性會顯示給使用者，但不格式化為連結。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserText%2A> property is empty, a link to the registration page is not available to the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserText%2A>屬性是空的不是，使用者可以使用 [註冊] 頁面的連結。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserText%2A> property to "Register new user..."
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserText%2A>「 註冊新使用者...」 的屬性

trans-unit.source: This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例包含一個文字方塊，可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of the new-user registration page.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定新使用者註冊頁面的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the new-user registration page.
trans-unit.target: 新使用者註冊頁面的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserUrl%2A> property contains the URL of the new-user registration page for the Web site.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserUrl%2A>屬性包含網站的 [新使用者註冊] 頁面的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserText%2A> property contains the text used for the link.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserText%2A>屬性包含用於連結的文字。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserText%2A> property is empty, the link to the registration page is unavailable to the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserText%2A>屬性是空的使用者無法使用 [註冊] 頁面的連結。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserUrl%2A> property to "register.aspx".
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserUrl%2A>"register.aspx"的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例包含一個文字方塊，可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of the page displayed to the user when a login attempt is successful.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在登入嘗試成功時顯示給使用者之頁面的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the page the user is redirected to when a login attempt is successful.
trans-unit.target: 登入嘗試成功時使用者被重新導向至之頁面的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.DestinationPageUrl%2A> property specifies the page that is displayed when a login attempt is successful.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.DestinationPageUrl%2A>屬性會指定成功登入嘗試時所顯示的頁面。

trans-unit.source: The default behavior of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control is to return the user to the referring page, or to the page defined in the `defaultUrl` attribute of the element in the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 預設行為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制項是要讓使用者返回到參照的頁面，或頁面中定義`defaultUrl`Web.config 檔案中項目的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.DestinationPageUrl%2A> property overrides the default behavior of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control, as well as the `defaultUrl` setting made in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.DestinationPageUrl%2A>屬性會覆寫的預設行為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制項，並將`defaultUrl`組態檔中所做的設定。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.DestinationPageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.DestinationPageUrl%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The Page_Load method is used to attach the URL of the referring page to the URL of the destination page so that the destination page can return the user to the original page if desired.
trans-unit.target: Page_Load 方法用來附加的 目的地 頁面的 url 的參考頁面的 URL，因此，需要目的地 頁面上的原始分頁傳回使用者。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to display a check box to enable the user to control whether a persistent cookie is sent to their browser.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示是否顯示核取方塊，讓使用者控制是否將永續性 Cookie 傳送至瀏覽器。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display the check box; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示顯示核取方塊，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.DisplayRememberMe%2A> property is set to `true`, the text contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RememberMeText%2A> property is displayed on the page, along with a Remember Me check box.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.DisplayRememberMe%2A>屬性設定為`true`中, 包含的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RememberMeText%2A>屬性隨即顯示在頁面上，以及 [記住我] 核取方塊。

trans-unit.source: When the user selects the Remember Me check box, the authentication cookie sent to his or her computer persists so that the user is automatically authenticated on future visits to the site.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者選取 [記住我] 核取方塊，驗證 cookie 傳送至其電腦持續發生，以便未來造訪網站上的自動驗證使用者。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RememberMeSet%2A> property is set by the selection in the Remember Me check box.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RememberMeSet%2A>屬性設定選取 [記住我] 核取方塊。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.DisplayRememberMe%2A> is `false`, a Remember Me check box is not displayed on the page and the user has no way to control whether the authentication cookie persists or not.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.DisplayRememberMe%2A>是`false`記住我 核取方塊不會顯示在頁面上，使用者會有任何方式來控制是否在驗證 cookie 持續發生，或不。

trans-unit.source: You can still set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RememberMeSet%2A> property to `true` to send a persistent authentication cookie to the user's browser without displaying the check box.
trans-unit.target: 您仍然可以設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RememberMeSet%2A>屬性`true`傳送給使用者的瀏覽器的永續性驗證 cookie，而不會顯示核取方塊。

trans-unit.source: There are inherent security risks with setting a persistent authentication cookie on a user's browser.
trans-unit.target: 沒有固有的安全性風險上使用者的瀏覽器設定持續性的驗證 cookie。

trans-unit.source: You should determine whether these security risks are acceptable to your site.
trans-unit.target: 您應該判斷是否可以接受您的網站將這些安全性風險。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RememberMeSet%2A> property to `true` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.DisplayRememberMe%2A> property to `false`, users visiting your Web site from public browsers, as in Internet cafes for example, can accidentally leave persistent authentication cookies behind and the next user of the browser will be able to access your Web site using the previous user's credentials.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RememberMeSet%2A>屬性`true`和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.DisplayRememberMe%2A>屬性`false`、 造訪的網站從公用的瀏覽器，如咖啡館比方說，可以不小心留下永續性的驗證 cookie 的網際網路使用者和下一步瀏覽器的使用者將能夠存取您的網站，使用前一位使用者的認證。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example disables the Remember Me check box by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.DisplayRememberMe%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會停用 [記住我] 核取方塊設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.DisplayRememberMe%2A>屬性`false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the action that occurs when a login attempt fails.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定登入嘗試失敗時發生的動作。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginFailureAction" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginFailureAction" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginFailureAction.Refresh" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginFailureAction.Refresh" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureAction%2A> property defines the behavior of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control when the user does not successfully log in to the Web site.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureAction%2A>屬性定義的行為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制當使用者不會不成功登入網站。

trans-unit.source: The default behavior reloads the page and displays the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureText%2A> property to alert the user that the login attempt failed.
trans-unit.target: 重新載入頁面的預設行為，並顯示的內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureText%2A>來提醒使用者的登入嘗試失敗的屬性。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureAction%2A> is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginFailureAction.RedirectToLoginPage>, the user is redirected to the login page defined in the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureAction%2A>設<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginFailureAction.RedirectToLoginPage>，使用者重新導向至 Web.config 檔案中定義的登入頁面。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureAction%2A> property both declaratively and in code.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureAction%2A>屬性宣告和程式碼中。

trans-unit.source: The selected value is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginFailureAction" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 選取的值不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginFailureAction" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text displayed when a login attempt fails.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定登入嘗試失敗時顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The text to display to the user when a login attempt fails.
trans-unit.target: 登入嘗試失敗時顯示給使用者的文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Your login attempt has failed.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 登入嘗試失敗。

trans-unit.source: Please try again."
trans-unit.target: 請重試。」

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureText%2A> property specifies the string that is displayed when a login attempt fails.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureText%2A>屬性指定的登入嘗試失敗時顯示的字串。

trans-unit.source: If you define a template for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control, you can indicate where on the template to display the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureText%2A> property by using a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control and giving that control the ID "FailureText".
trans-unit.target: 如果您定義的範本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制項，您可以指定要顯示範本上的位置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureText%2A>屬性使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>控制項，並提供可控制"FailureText 」 的識別碼。

trans-unit.source: When you use a template, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureTextStyle%2A> property is not applied to the text specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用範本，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureTextStyle%2A>屬性不會套用到中指定的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureText%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The default text for the property is localized based on the server's current locale.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的預設文字會根據伺服器的目前地區設定來當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: For security reasons, the login failure text should not include a specific reason for the failure.
trans-unit.target: 基於安全性理由，登入失敗文字不應該包含特定失敗的原因。

trans-unit.source: For example, an error message such as "Password not valid for user \<username>" reveals to a potential attacker that \<username> is a user on the system.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，這類的錯誤訊息 」 不適用於使用者的密碼\<使用者名稱 > 」 會顯示給潛在攻擊者，\<使用者名稱 > 是在系統上的使用者。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Display Safe Error Messages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f70ac33-6e11-4e98-ab7d-bae9c0e7eefa).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 顯示安全的錯誤訊息](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f70ac33-6e11-4e98-ab7d-bae9c0e7eefa)。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureText%2A> property to "There was an error while logging you in.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureText%2A>屬性 」 您登入時時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Please try again.".
trans-unit.target: 請再試一次。 」。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the appearance of error text in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得定義 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login" /> 控制項中錯誤文字外觀之屬性集合的參考。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> that contains properties that define the appearance of error text.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 的參考，包含定義錯誤文字外觀的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureTextStyle%2A> property gets a reference to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object that you use to change the appearance of login failure text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureTextStyle%2A>屬性取得的參考<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>物件，以便用來變更登入失敗文字的外觀。

trans-unit.source: The default is to display the text in red.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是以紅色顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>它所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> class (for example, `FailureTextStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>類別 (例如， `FailureTextStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `FailureTextStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以程式設計方式設定屬性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `FailureTextStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 一般設定包括自訂背景色彩、 文字色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureTextStyle%2A> property defines the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureTextStyle%2A>屬性定義的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureText%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureTextStyle%2A> property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control.
trans-unit.target: 樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureTextStyle%2A>屬性會與樣式設定合併<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Any settings made in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureTextStyle%2A> property override the corresponding settings in properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control.
trans-unit.target: 中所做的任何設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureTextStyle%2A>屬性覆寫屬性中的對應設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control style properties are overridden by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureTextStyle%2A> settings:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制項樣式屬性會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureTextStyle%2A>設定：

trans-unit.source: When you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureTextStyle%2A> property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用範本來定義外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureTextStyle%2A>屬性沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: The following code example specifies the login failure text style by setting the background and text color properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object referenced in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureTextStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例指定登入失敗文字樣式，藉由設定背景和文字色彩屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>中所參考物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureTextStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the location of an image to display next to the link to the login Help page.
trans-unit.target: 取得顯示在登入 [說明] 頁面連結旁邊之映像的位置。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the image to display.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示的映像 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of a link to the login Help page.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定登入 [說明] 頁面之連結的文字。

trans-unit.source: The text of the link to the login Help page.
trans-unit.target: 登入 [說明] 頁面之連結的文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.HelpPageText%2A> property contains the link text to the login Help page for the site.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.HelpPageText%2A>屬性包含網站的登入說明頁面的連結文字。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the login Help page is specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.HelpPageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 登入的 [說明] 頁面的 URL 中指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.HelpPageUrl%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.HelpPageUrl%2A> is empty, the text in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.HelpPageText%2A> property is displayed to the user on the page, but is not formatted as a link.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.HelpPageUrl%2A>為空的、 中的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.HelpPageText%2A>屬性就會顯示在頁面上，使用者，但不是會格式化為連結。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.HelpPageText%2A> property is empty, the link to the login Help page is not available to the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.HelpPageText%2A>屬性是空的不是可供使用者登入說明網頁的連結。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.HelpPageText%2A>屬性包含用於連結的文字。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets login instruction text for the user.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定使用者的登入指示文字。

trans-unit.source: The login instruction text to display to the user.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示給使用者的登入指示文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.InstructionText%2A> property contains instructions for users logging in to the Web site.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.InstructionText%2A>屬性包含使用者登入網站的指示。

trans-unit.source: This text is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control, following the title.
trans-unit.target: 此文字會顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>下列標題的控制項。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.InstructionText%2A> property is set to <xref:System.String.Empty>, no instruction text is available to the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.InstructionText%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.String.Empty>，沒有指示文字是供使用者使用。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template used to display the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用於顯示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login" /> 控制項的樣板。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> that contains the template for displaying the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" />，包含顯示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login" /> 控制項的樣板。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LayoutTemplate%2A> property contains the template that defines how the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control is displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LayoutTemplate%2A>屬性包含範本，以定義如何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制項顯示給使用者。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the required and optional controls used in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control template.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出使用中的必要和選擇性控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制項範本。

trans-unit.source: ID or command name
trans-unit.target: 識別碼或命令名稱

trans-unit.source: Control type
trans-unit.target: 控制項類型

trans-unit.source: Required/optional
trans-unit.target: 必要/選用

trans-unit.source: Any control that implements <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>, including <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>, or a custom or third-party control.
trans-unit.target: 實作的任何控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>，包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>，或自訂或協力廠商控制項。

trans-unit.source: Required
trans-unit.target: 必要

trans-unit.source: Any control that implements <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>, including <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>, or a custom or third-party control.
trans-unit.target: 實作的任何控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>，包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>，或自訂或協力廠商控制項。

trans-unit.source: Required
trans-unit.target: 必要

trans-unit.source: Optional
trans-unit.target: Optional

trans-unit.source: Any control that implements <xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl>.
trans-unit.target: 實作的任何控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl>。

trans-unit.source: Optional
trans-unit.target: Optional

trans-unit.source: Any control that causes event bubbling.
trans-unit.target: 造成事件反昇任何控制項。

trans-unit.source: Optional
trans-unit.target: Optional

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control throws an <xref:System.Web.HttpException> exception if the layout template does not contain the required controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制會擲回<xref:System.Web.HttpException>例外狀況，如果版面配置範本未包含必要的控制項。

trans-unit.source: No exception is thrown if you give an optional control ID to a control of the wrong type; however, the control is subsequently ignored by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果您提供的選擇性控制識別碼至錯誤的類型; 的控制項，會擲不回任何例外狀況不過，如果控制項之後忽略由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The login control can be any control that causes event bubbling, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>.
trans-unit.target: 登入控制項可以是任何控制項之事件反昇，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>。

trans-unit.source: The control's command name property must be set to "Login".
trans-unit.target: 控制項的命令名稱屬性必須設定為"Login"。

trans-unit.source: This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例包含一個文字方塊，可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the control state to restore.
trans-unit.target: 物件，表示要還原的控制項狀態。

trans-unit.source: Restores view-state information from a previous request that was saved with the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SaveViewState" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 從使用 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SaveViewState" /> 方法所儲存的先前要求來還原檢視狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="savedState" /> is not a valid <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister.ViewState" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="savedState" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister.ViewState" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user logs in to the Web site and has been authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者登入網站且已經過驗證時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggedIn> event is raised after the authentication provider checks the user's credentials and the authentication cookie is queued to send to the browser in the next response.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggedIn>驗證提供者會檢查使用者的認證，並將傳送至瀏覽器中的下一個回應的驗證 cookie 會排入佇列之後，就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggedIn> event to provide additional processing, such as accessing per-user data, after the user is authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggedIn>事件來提供額外的處理，例如使用者通過驗證後存取每個使用者資料。

trans-unit.source: When a user submits his or her login information, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control first raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggingIn> event, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Authenticate> event, and finally the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggedIn> event.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者提交他或她的登入資訊<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制第一個引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggingIn>事件，則<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Authenticate>事件，最後再<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggedIn>事件。

trans-unit.source: When a user uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control to log in to a Web site, all data in the view state and all post data is lost.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制項來登入的網站，檢視狀態中的所有資料和所有的張貼資料都會遺失。

trans-unit.source: Do not perform actions in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggedIn> event that rely on the view state.
trans-unit.target: 不會執行動作中的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggedIn>依賴檢視狀態的事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggedIn> event to call a site-specific method that keeps a record of user logins.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggedIn>呼叫的站台特有的方法，會保留記錄的使用者登入事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a user submits login information, before authentication takes place.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者送出登入資訊之後，進行驗證之前。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggingIn> event is raised when a user submits login information but before the user is authenticated on the Web site.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggingIn>使用者提交登入資訊時，但在網站上驗證使用者之前，就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggingIn> event to set up any information that you need before authenticating a user.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggingIn>事件，以設定您需要先驗證使用者的任何資訊。

trans-unit.source: You can cancel a login attempt during the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggingIn> event by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 您可以取消登入嘗試期間<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggingIn>藉由設定事件<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>物件`true`。

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggingIn> event is raised, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Authenticate> event and then the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggedIn> event.
trans-unit.target: 之後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggingIn>引發事件時，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Authenticate>事件，然後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggedIn>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggingIn> event to ensure that the user has entered a well-formed email address in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.UserName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggingIn>事件以確保使用者已輸入正確格式的電子郵件地址<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.UserName%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If not, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggingIn> event cancels the login attempt and displays an error message using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.InstructionText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有，則<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggingIn>取消的登入嘗試事件，並顯示錯誤訊息使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.InstructionText%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Represents the command name associated with the login button.
trans-unit.target: 表示與登入按鈕關聯的命令名稱。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonCommandName> is a read-only field and the default value is "Login".
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonCommandName> 是唯讀欄位，預設值是 「 登入 」。

trans-unit.source: This value is passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.OnBubbleEvent%2A>, and if the value is "Login", the control attempts to log in the current user.
trans-unit.target: 這個值會傳遞至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.OnBubbleEvent%2A>，和控制項的值為"Login"，如果嘗試登入目前的使用者。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of an image to use for the login button.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要用於登入按鈕之影像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the image used for the login button.
trans-unit.target: 用於登入按鈕之影像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonImageUrl%2A> property contains the URL of the image rendered as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control login button when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonType%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType.Image>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonImageUrl%2A>屬性包含轉譯為影像的 URL<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制登入按鈕時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonType%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType.Image>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonText%2A> property is used as the alternative text for the image in browsers that do not display images.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonText%2A>屬性作為替代文字不會顯示映像的瀏覽器中的映像。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonImageUrl%2A> property to the URL of an image.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonImageUrl%2A>影像的 URL 的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> object that allows you to set the appearance of the login button in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> 物件的參考，其可讓您設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login" /> 控制項中登入按鈕的外觀。

trans-unit.source: A reference to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> that represents the style of the login button.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> 的參考，表示登入按鈕的樣式。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonStyle%2A> property to control the appearance of the login button in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonStyle%2A>屬性，即可控制中的登入按鈕的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>它所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `LoginButtonStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>類別 (例如， `LoginButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `LoginButtonStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以程式設計方式設定屬性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `LoginButtonStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 一般設定包括自訂背景色彩、 文字色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonStyle%2A> property defines the appearance of the login button.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonStyle%2A>屬性定義的登入按鈕外觀。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonStyle%2A> property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control.
trans-unit.target: 樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonStyle%2A>屬性會與樣式設定合併<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Any settings made in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonStyle%2A> property override the corresponding settings in properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control.
trans-unit.target: 中所做的任何設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonStyle%2A>屬性覆寫屬性中的對應設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> style properties are overridden by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonStyle%2A> settings:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>樣式屬性會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonStyle%2A>設定：

trans-unit.source: When you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonStyle%2A> property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用範本來定義外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonStyle%2A>屬性沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonStyle%2A> property to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control login button.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonStyle%2A>屬性來定義外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制登入 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login" /> control's login button.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login" /> 控制項之登入按鈕的文字。

trans-unit.source: The text used for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login" /> control's login button.
trans-unit.target: 用於 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login" /> 控制項之登入按鈕的文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Login".
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 "Login"。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonText%2A> property contains the text displayed for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control's login button.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonText%2A>屬性包含顯示的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制項的登入按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonType%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonText%2A> property can appear as text on a button, as text displayed as an alternative to an image in browsers that do not render images, or as the text of a link.
trans-unit.target: 值而定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonType%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonText%2A>屬性可顯示為文字的按鈕，以替代並不會轉譯影像的瀏覽器中的映像或連結的文字顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes how the different <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonType%2A> values affect the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述如何不同<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonType%2A>值會影響<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonText%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonType%2A> setting
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonType%2A> 設定

trans-unit.source: How the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonText%2A> property is used.
trans-unit.target: 如何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonText%2A>屬性使用。

trans-unit.source: As the button's `Text` property.
trans-unit.target: 為按鈕`Text`屬性。

trans-unit.source: As alternative text for the image.
trans-unit.target: 為影像的替代文字。

trans-unit.source: As link text.
trans-unit.target: 做為連結文字。

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the server's current locale.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的預設文字會依據伺服器目前的地區設定進行當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何在文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonText%2A>屬性的值會影響<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonType%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.target: 這個範例包含一個文字方塊，可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of button to use when rendering the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login" /> button.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定呈現 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login" /> 按鈕時需要使用的按鈕類型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType.Button" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType.Button" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonType%2A> property determines the type of button to use for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control's login button.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonType%2A>屬性會決定要使用的按鈕類型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制項的登入按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the different button types.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述不同的按鈕類型。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonType%2A> setting
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonType%2A> 設定

trans-unit.source: Type of button rendered
trans-unit.target: 呈現的按鈕類型

trans-unit.source: An HTML button with the text specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: HTML 按鈕中指定的文字與<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonText%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: An image.
trans-unit.target: 映像。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the image is specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonImageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 中所指定之影像的 URL<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonImageUrl%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The string specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonText%2A> property is used as alternate text for the image.
trans-unit.target: 中指定的字串<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonText%2A>屬性會當做替代文字使用映像。

trans-unit.source: An HTML link with the text specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 以文字中指定的 HTML 連結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonText%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonType%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType.Button> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType.Link>, the content of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonImageUrl%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonType%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType.Button>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType.Link>、 內容的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonImageUrl%2A>屬性會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a login error is detected.
trans-unit.target: 發生於偵測到登入錯誤時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginError> event is raised when the credentials entered by the user are invalid.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginError>使用者所輸入的認證不正確時引發事件。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginError> event to redirect the user to a custom error page, to offer additional help, or to log failed login attempts.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginError>事件，以將使用者重新導向至自訂錯誤頁面，來提供額外說明，或記錄失敗的登入嘗試。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginError>登入嘗試失敗時，向使用者顯示說明連結的事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the membership data provider used by the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項所使用之成員資格資料提供者的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the membership data provider used by the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項所使用之成員資格資料提供者的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.MembershipProvider%2A> property contains the name of the data provider that provides the authentication information for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.MembershipProvider%2A>屬性包含提供的驗證資訊的資料提供者名稱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Valid membership provider names are defined in the `<membership>` element in your application's Machine.config or Web.config file.

trans-unit.source: (These providers are configured in Web.config.) In the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.OnLoggingIn%2A> method, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.MembershipProvider%2A> property is set to the selected value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control.

trans-unit.source: If you manipulate the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.UserName%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Password%2A> properties programmatically, it is important to do so at the correct time during the page life cycle.

trans-unit.source: The values of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.UserName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Password%2A> are not available during the `Page_Load` phase, but are during the `Pre_Render` phase.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.UserName%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Password%2A>期間沒有`Page_Load`階段，但在`Pre_Render`階段。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control properties represented by text boxes, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.UserName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Password%2A>, are accessible during all phases of the page life cycle.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> 控制由文字方塊中，例如屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.UserName%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Password%2A>，都可以存取頁面生命週期的所有階段。
